name: CARE_PATH_HX
description: Historical information for Care Path episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_STEP_IDENT
columns.description: History of care path steps on which the patient has been, where the most recent step is considered the active care path step.

columns.name: HX_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The time, stored as UTC, when the patient moved to a step on a care path and that step was made active.

columns.name: HX_USER_ID
columns.description: User that moved the patient to a step on a Care Path.

columns.name: HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: HX_LINK_IDENT
columns.description: This item stores the care path link that was used to move the patient to this care path step.

columns.name: HX_ALERT_ID
columns.description: This item networks to historical information about the advisory that moved the patient to a step on a care path.

columns.name: HX_EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The effective date for the care path step as entered by the user when manually moving the patient to that step on the care path.

columns.name: HX_INSTANT_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The time, stored as local time, when the patient moved to a step on a care path and that step was made active.
